document_name: Law No. 19.126 on Mining Activities in Gran Porte
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/URY/2013/URY-2013-09-11-Law No. 19.126 on Mining Activities in Gran Porte_f3008a1f5c61c2a13fb37d6fc16981f1.pdf
document_description: Creates an Intergenerational Sovereign Fund for Investment which may allocate resources to projects to adapt and mitigate the impact of climate change.
